duties_responsibilities.duty: Originate and prepare new loans in compliance with internal policies and procedures.
Counsel and pre-qualify potential customers, obtain and analyze loan application information, and advise customers regarding the loan process.
Maintain communication between customers and internal teams, ensuring timely information and documentation exchange.
Stay informed of market trends and developments, research products and underwriting guidelines.
Comply with all laws, rules, and regulations pertaining to mortgage loans.
Participate in real estate functions or special events to develop and maintain relationships.
Work with Branch Manager and other Loan Officers on local marketing campaigns.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years’ experience in originating mortgage loans.
